snippet: Wayne LaPierre, the executive vice president of the National Rifle Association, criticized the news media’s focus on the fatal shooting of Trayvon Martin.
abstract: National Rifle Association executive vice president Wayne LaPierre accuses the news media of engaging in sensationalized coverage of the Trayvon Martin killing.
lead_paragraph: Wayne LaPierre, the executive vice president of the National Rifle Association, criticized the news media’s focus on the fatal shooting of Trayvon Martin.

headline.seo: N.R.A. Criticizes Trayvon Martin Media Coverage
headline.main: N.R.A. Official Attacks Florida Shooting Coverage
headline.print_headline: N.R.A. Official Attacks Florida Shooting Coverage
